title: Microsoft’s Xbox streaming device reportedly arriving within a year, Chromecast-like form factor
content:
Microsoft’s ambitions in cloud gaming so far have largely been limited to mobile and building on the console experience, but the company hasn’t been shy about a future where it sells Xbox hardware that relies fully on streaming. Now, we might finally have a timeline for the first Xbox streaming device.

description: According to a new report, we can expect the Xbox streaming device to debut sometime in the next year, and look like a Chromecast.
